features: Always Evolving SSD: The 970 EVO Plus is powered by the latest V-NAND technology and firmware optimization, maximizing the potential of NVMe bandwidth; Comes in storage capacities of up to 2TB, with reliability of up to 1,200 TBW.Computer Platform:PC.Voltage : 3.3 V ± 5 % Allowable voltage..Allowable Voltage : 3.3 V ± 5 % Allowable voltage
Breakthrough Read/Write Speeds: The 970 EVO Plus reaches sequential read/write speeds up to 3,500/3,300 MB/s, up to 53%* faster than the 970 EVO
Samsung Magician for Data Security: This software provides a suite of user-friendly tools that help you keep your drive up to date, monitor drive health and speed, and even boost performance
Superior Heat Dissipation: Samsung’s Dynamic Thermal Guard automatically monitors and maintains optimal operating temperatures to minimize performance drops

6 Year Limited Warranty: The 970 EVO Plus provides up to 600 TBW (Terabytes Written) with 5-years of protection for exceptional endurance powered by the latest V-NAND technology and Samsung's reputation for quality
Note: Refer to the troubleshooting steps in product description.
body.description: >For intensive workloads on PCs and workstations, the Samsung 970 EVO Plus delivers ultimate performance powered by Samsung's NVMe SSD leadership. It is upgraded to be faster than the 970 EVO. It maximizes the potential of NVMe bandwidth for unbeatable computing that meets the needs of the most demanding tech enthusiasts and professionals. For performance that puts you in command, the 970 EVO Plus combines the next-gen PCIe Gen 3.0 x4 NVMe interface with the latest V-NAND technology to achieve fearless read/write speeds up to 3,500/3,300MB/s,* up to 53%** faster than the 970 EVO. Samsung’s advanced nickel-coated controller and heat spreader on the 970 EVO Plus enable superior heat dissipation. The Dynamic Thermal Guard automatically monitors and maintains optimal operating temperatures to minimize performance drops. Samsung Magician software will help you keep an eye on your drive. A suite of user-friendly tools helps keep your drive up to date, monitor drive health and speed, and even boost performance. *Performance may vary depending on SSD’s firmware version and system hardware & configuration. Performance measurements based on IOmeter 1.1.0. The write performances were measured with Intelligent TurboWrite technology being activated. The sequential write performances after Intelligent TurboWrite region are: 400 MB/s(250GB), 900 MB/s(500GB), 1,700 MB/s(1TB) and 1,750 MB/s(2TB). Test system configuration: Intel Core i7-7700K CPU @4.2GHz, DDR4 2400MHz 32GB, OS-Windows 10 Built 10240, Chipset–ASUS PRIME Z270-A. **Up to 53 percent performance increase for sequential write speed for 250GB version. ***TBW: Terabytes Written ****Warrantied TBW for 970 EVO Plus: 150 TBW for 250GB model, 300 TBW for 500GB model, 600 TBW for 1TB model, 1,200 TBW for 2TB model. 5-years or TBW, whichever comes first. For more information on the warranty, please find the enclosed warranty statement in the package.Maximum: 9 W (Burst mode)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blazing Fast and Reliable: A Game-Changer for Storage!
reviews.reviewText: Blazing Fast and Reliable: A Game-Changer for Storage!I recently upgraded my system with the Samsung 970 EVO Plus SSD 1TB NVMe M.2 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance.Firstly, the installation was a breeze thanks to its M.2 form factor, fitting snugly into my motherboard without any hassle. Once up and running, the speed boost was immediately noticeable. The read and write speeds are astonishing, significantly reducing boot times and application load times. I can now say goodbye to those dreaded loading screens during gaming sessions!What's truly impressive is the drive's reliability. Samsung has a solid reputation for quality, and this SSD lives up to that reputation. I've experienced no slowdowns or crashes since installing it, even with heavy multitasking and demanding software.The 1TB capacity provides ample space for my extensive media library and numerous games, offering the perfect balance between speed and storage. The drive's heat management is also commendable, maintaining consistent performance without overheating.Additionally, Samsung's Magician software is a fantastic tool, offering features like firmware updates, performance optimization, and data security, adding even more value to an already outstanding product.In conclusion, the Samsung 970 EVO Plus SSD is a game-changer for anyone seeking top-tier performance and reliability in storage solutions. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or professional requiring speed and stability, this SSD is a worthwhile investment that delivers beyond expectations. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightning-Fast and Reliable Upgrade
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded my system with the SAMSUNG 970 EVO Plus SSD, and it's a game-changer! Blazing fast speeds, easy installation, and top-notch reliability. Boots up in seconds, applications launch instantly. The 500GB capacity is perfect, and the NVMe interface delivers unparalleled performance. Samsung Magician software adds convenience, and the build quality ensures long-term durability. Worth the investment for a noticeable boost in speed and responsiveness! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves its purpose. Works good for new builds and current builds.
reviews.reviewText: I recently made a thoughtful purchase to enhance my new PC build – a cutting-edge NVMe M.2 drive. The installation process was remarkably straightforward, provided you were well-acquainted with your motherboard's layout and knew precisely where to place it. This drive proved to be an excellent choice, offering an array of storage options that cater to various needs. Personally, I opted for the 1 TB variant, which I believe strikes an ideal balance between storage capacity and speed for gaming enthusiasts who often have 8 or more large games simultaneously installed.The transition to NVMe M.2 drives from conventional SATA options has been a game-changer for me. Not only do they offer blazing fast speeds, but the ease of installation is a major plus. You no longer need to contend with cumbersome data and power cables; instead, you simply slide the M.2 drive into its designated slot on the motherboard. This not only simplifies the setup process but also ensures a cleaner and more efficient cable management system within your PC.Overall, my decision to opt for this NVMe M.2 drive has significantly enhanced the performance and storage capacity of my new PC build. It's a testament to the ever-evolving technology in the realm of computing, and I would highly recommend considering such drives for anyone looking to upgrade their system and streamline their gaming experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevate Your Gaming Experience with this SSD
reviews.reviewText: The SAMSUNG 970 EVO Plus SSD has truly transformed my gaming and graphics experience, offering unparalleled speed, performance, and storage capacity.This SSD isn't just an upgrade; it's a game-changer. With its V-NAND technology, it's designed to deliver top-tier performance that's perfect for gaming, graphics work, and memory-intensive tasks.One of the standout features of this SSD is its remarkable speed. The read and write speeds are simply impressive, ensuring that games load faster, files transfer swiftly, and overall system responsiveness is heightened.The 1TB storage capacity is a significant improvement over traditional hard drives, providing ample space for all my games, software, and multimedia files.The heat control mechanism is another highlight. It ensures that the SSD remains cool during intense gaming sessions, preventing any performance degradation due to overheating.Personally, I've witnessed a substantial improvement in loading times, graphical rendering, and overall system performance since integrating the SSD into my setup.One standout application for me is in open-world games where loading screens used to disrupt the immersion. Now, with the rapid loading times of the SSD, I can seamlessly explore game worlds without interruption.Installation was a breeze, thanks to the M.2 form factor that easily fits into compatible slots on the motherboard.In conclusion, this SSD is an investment that pays off in exceptional performance, speed, and storage capacity. Whether you're a hardcore gamer or a graphics enthusiast, this SSD is designed to elevate your experience and provide a new level of efficiency and responsiveness. Embrace the power of SAMSUNG's technology and unlock a world of seamless gaming and graphics performance with the 970 EVO Plus SSD.

El desempeño de este SSD es implacable, con tiempos de carga inexistentes o limitados solamente por la RAM o CPU que integre tu equipo.1TB es la capacidad ideal para tu equipo si planeas mantenerlo por una cantidad de tiempo relativamente prolongadaLa calidad de los materiales/elaboración es de lo mejor, tenerlo en las manos supone una sensación de haber adquirido algo que vale lo que cuesta y no te arrepentirás

reviews.reviewTitle: Turbocharge Your System with Samsung 970 EVO Plus SSD
reviews.reviewText: The Samsung 970 EVO Plus 1TB NVMe M.2 Internal SSD is a game-changer for anyone seeking to supercharge their computer's performance.The 1TB capacity is generous, providing ample space for my OS, applications, and all my files, without the need for constant data management. It's a significant upgrade for anyone who's been struggling with the limitations of traditional hard drives or smaller SSDs.Installation was a breeze thanks to the M.2 form factor, and Samsung's SSD management software made migration and optimization straightforward. I was up and running in no time.The build quality is top-notch, as expected from Samsung. It's reliable and durable, and I have confidence that my data is secure with this drive.What's also impressive is the heat dissipation. Even with heavy use, the 970 EVO Plus maintains excellent temperatures, which is essential for the longevity and stability of the drive.

reviews.reviewTitle: Vale a pena pelo upgrade enorme que traz ante um HDD, mas recomendo pesquisar bem como instalar.
reviews.reviewText: Estou usando há quase um mês, até agora não apresentou problemas. Deixou meu notebook perceptivelmente mais rápido, tanto para ligar ou abrir programas. Foi de 10 ou mais minutos na inicialização, para menos de 1. Alguns jogos que também levavam vários minutos para carregar também estão carregando em segundos. De modo geral um ótimo produto, apesar do preço um pouco salgado, mas é de se esperar considerando que deixa a máquina melhor do que nova.

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buen producto pero incompatible con mi iMac 2015
reviews.reviewText: Se le ve buen producto, cuidado empaquetado y demás pero por desgracia no es compatible con mi iMac (Retina 4K, 21.5 pulgadas, finales de 2015). A mi pesar lo he devuelto.Gracias a Amazón por facilitar todo el proceso de devolución.
utiliser en disque dur. Rapidité étonnante
